summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2805, for the improvement of Fairview Avenue North from the south margin of East Galer Street to the north margin of Roanoke Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a bridge roadway thereon; by grading and planking the same where necessary; under Ordinance No. 33633 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
